name: places/ChIJ6S1ucu9YwokRhId7eNLrzMo
formattedAddress: 939 8th Ave Suite 609, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 939 8th Ave Suite 609, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Poole is amazing! He’s super welcoming, kind and knowledgable. I always appreciate that he dedicates time to inform me on what he notices in my body so it feels more like a holistic/collaborative experience rather than a regular doctors appointment! Thankful for all the tips and exercises that he shares which have truly helped me compliment our sessions.

Where would these samba/salsa hips and low back be without ya!

PS: his dog is my fav ✨

originalText.text: I've been going to Encore Chiro for over a year now, and it has been absolutely fabulous. Dr. Poole is such a knowledgeable, compassionate and fun guy. He took great care of me and the nuances of some of my health conditions. Can't recommend him enough! GO see him!

text.text: I've been going to Encore Chiro for over a year now, and it has been absolutely fabulous. Dr. Poole is such a knowledgeable, compassionate and fun guy. He took great care of me and the nuances of some of my health conditions. Can't recommend him enough! GO see him!

originalText.text: I've been coming to Dr. Brian Poole's office for a couple of years. He does excellent work and is a master at diagnosing potential problems. I've come mostly for acute pain/problems, but the more I see him, the more I've started to come in more of a maintenance style. He has a great office, plenty of knowledge and if you're looking for a wonderful chiropractor, he's an excellent choice! I've referred many friends to him!

text.text: I've been coming to Dr. Brian Poole's office for a couple of years. He does excellent work and is a master at diagnosing potential problems. I've come mostly for acute pain/problems, but the more I see him, the more I've started to come in more of a maintenance style. He has a great office, plenty of knowledge and if you're looking for a wonderful chiropractor, he's an excellent choice! I've referred many friends to him!

originalText.text:
Brian is the most knowledgeable chiropractor I have ever had the pleasure of working with. His practice goes well beyond the standard norm of chiropractic performance and truly helps clients to understand the why behind their pain. I have referred numerous friends and family who all came back with glowing reviews.

There is a neurological connection between all the systems of our body and Brian is the professional you should speak with to realign your thinking about chiropractors. Do yourself a favor and call him today!

originalText.text: Brian is the best!  I have been a corrective body worker in NYC for 11 years and I have worked with several Chiropractors and other professionals in that time.  I have grown to trust Brian over the others and happily and trustingly send my clients and friends to him as well as see him myself regularly.  Do yourself a favor and make the appointment!
